about_the_game: Redneck Brawl Turbo is a casual auto shooter that unfolds in a quirky world, drawing inspiration from 1980s martial arts comedy movies. Play as a guy who must save his village. Fight waves of wacky enemies. Earn coins and spend them on lessons from the Kung Fu Master, Drunken Master, and Ninja.
